# believe_webhook (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "believe_webhook" "example_webhook" {
  url = "https://example.com/webhooks"
  description = "Production webhook for match notifications"
  event_types = ["match.completed", "team_member.transferred"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `url` (String) The URL to send webhook events to

### Optional

- `description` (String) Optional description for this webhook
- `event_types` (List of String) List of event types to subscribe to. If not provided, subscribes to all events.
- `webhook_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) When the webhook was registered
- `id` (String) Unique webhook identifier
- `message` (String) Status message
- `secret` (String) The secret key for verifying webhook signatures (base64 encoded)
- `ted_says` (String) Ted's reaction
- `webhook` (Attributes) The registered webhook details (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--webhook))

<a id="nestedatt--webhook"></a>
### Nested Schema for `webhook`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) When the webhook was registered
- `description` (String) Optional description for this webhook
- `event_types` (List of String) List of event types this webhook is subscribed to
- `id` (String) Unique webhook identifier
- `secret` (String) The secret key for verifying webhook signatures (base64 encoded)
- `url` (String) The URL to send webhook events to
